New England's Fall Foliage | A Women Only Tour | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP New England's Fall Foliage, A Women Only Tour 8 Days | Boston Roundtrip Celebrate the Splendor and Riches of New England on an 8-Day Women's Tour in the U.S. Experience the captivating diversity of New England on an exclusive eight-day tour designed for women. Begin in Boston, one of America's oldest cities, where you'll walk the historic red-brick Freedom Trail and visit the site of the country's inaugural town meeting. Marvel at Vermont's vibrant foliage as you journey to Stowe, exploring the women-owned Bread and Butter Farm in Montpelier and indulging in maple syrup tastings at a local farm. Glide up Loon Mountain Resort's gondola in New Hampshire's White Mountains for panoramic views, and engage in a MAKE TRAVEL MATTER Experience with a naturalist, delving into the wildlife and ecology of the North Woods. Discover Portland, Maine's oldest lighthouse, and conclude your intimate group adventure with a sumptuous lobster dinner. Deal Details Travel Dates Sep 2025, Sep 2026 Priced From $10,725 per person Enquire Now Description Celebrate the Splendor and Riches of New England on an 8-Day Women's Tour in the U.S. Experience the captivating diversity of New England on an exclusive eight-day tour designed for women. Begin in Boston, one of America's oldest cities, where you'll walk the historic red-brick Freedom Trail and visit the site of the country's inaugural town meeting. Marvel at Vermont's vibrant foliage as you journey to Stowe, exploring the women-owned Bread and Butter Farm in Montpelier and indulging in maple syrup tastings at a local farm. Glide up Loon Mountain Resort's gondola in New Hampshire's White Mountains for panoramic views, and engage in a MAKE TRAVEL MATTER Experience with a naturalist, delving into the wildlife and ecology of the North Woods. Discover Portland, Maine's oldest lighthouse, and conclude your intimate group adventure with a sumptuous lobster dinner. Pricing Departure Date For 2 Adults in Twin Share, price per person For 2 Adults in 2 Singles, price per person For 1 Adult in Single Share 28 Sep 25 $10,725 $13,274 $13,274 16 Sep 26* $14,394 $19,430 $19,430 18 Sep 26* $12,990 $17,027 $17,027 23 Sep 26* $14,130 $18,953 $18,953 *Itinerary may change for 2026 departures Itinerary Itinerary is subject to change Day 1 Boston Day 2 Boston to Saratoga Springs Day 3 Saratoga Springs to Weston to Billings to Stowe Day 4 Stowe to Waterbury to Stowe Day 5 Stowe to Franconia Notch State Park to North Conway Day 6 North Conway Day 7 North Conway to Kennebunkport to Portland Day 8 Portland to Boston Highlights Explore Mount Washington Valley's ecological insights on autumn: learn about flora and fauna at Mount Washington's summit and discover wildlife strategies to survive New England's seasons. Kancamagus Scenic Byway to North Conway: travel through dazzling crimson and orange hues. Experience 34.5 miles of natural beauty unspoiled by industry. Visit Woodstock and Billings Farm: explore the quintessential Vermont village of Woodstock. Visit Rockefeller's Billings Farm and Museum showcasing Vermont's rural past. Birdhouse Building at Trapp Family Lodge: join an interactive activity to build a birdhouse. Use natural materials and decorate your own souvenir. Lake Champlain Chocolates: indulge in award-winning ice cream and chocolates crafted with local ingredients like fresh cream and maple syrup. Gondola SkyRide at Loon Mountain Resort: enjoy panoramic views of New England, New York, and Canada. Scenic ride weather permitting, at Loon Mountain Resort. Hike to Diana's Baths in White Mountain National Forest: a scenic hike to captivating cascading waterfalls located within the serene White Mountain National Forest. Inclusions 4 & 5 Star Hotels in great locations Daily breakfasts and many relaxed start mornings after 9am Business Class style coaches with extra legroom A network of passionate local experts Premium dining in top-rated restaurants 24/7 personal service - knowledgeable Travel Director & expert driver Insider Access, Insightful Encounters, Iconic Highlights, and Insight Choice experiences All porterage, gratuities and tips Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
